text: Vermont Route 9 (VT 9) is a state highway in the U.S. state of Vermont. The highway's west end is at New York State Route 7 (NY 7) at the New York state line near Bennington. Its east end is at New Hampshire Route 9 (NH 9) at the New Hampshire state line in Brattleboro. The highway is long. The highway also meets three major northâ€“south routes: U.S. Route 7 (US 7) in Bennington and Interstate 91 (I-91) and US 5 in Brattleboro. ==References== Category:Geography of Vermont
title: Vermont Route 9
